title: GH-162: Investigate 'Pulled models don't show on list'

investigation.symptom: User reported pulled models don't appear in apr list
investigation.actual_behavior: apr list correctly shows all models pulled via 'apr pull' from pacha manifest
findings: Manifest tracks 3 models (pulled via apr pull)
3 SafeTensors files exist but were downloaded via other methods (HF Hub direct)
apr list correctly reads manifest.json and displays tracked models

five_whys: WHY don't some models show? → They weren't pulled via apr pull
WHY weren't they tracked? → Downloaded directly via HF Hub, not apr pull
WHY different methods? → User may have used hf-hub CLI or direct download
WHY is this confusing? → Users expect all cache files to appear
ROOT CAUSE: Expected behavior - apr list shows apr-pulled models only

resolution.action: Document behavior: apr list shows models pulled via apr pull
resolution.recommendation: Consider adding --all flag to show orphan files in cache

verification.result: Shows 3 models (1.04 GB, 2.88 GB, 468.64 MB) correctly from manifest
